relevant_findings.general: Well-appearing man in NAD, comfortable, pleasant, and cooperative.
relevant_findings.heent: NC/AT, PERRLA, EOMI, sclerae anicteric, MMM, OP clear, small healed lac on upper inner lip.
relevant_findings.lungs: CTA bilat, no r/rh/wh, good air movement, resp unlabored, no accessory muscle use.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Midline healed surgical scar with 2cm erythematous area above umbilicus with mild skin breakdown, NABS, soft, obese abdomen, moderately distended, abdomen nontender, no masses or HSM, no rebound/guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: L BKA, WWP, no c/c/e, 2+ peripheral pulses (radials, DPs).
relevant_findings.skin: 2cm erythematous area with mild skin breakdown.
relevant_findings.neuro: Awake, A&Ox3, CNs II-XII grossly intact, muscle strength ___ throughout, sensation grossly intact throughout.

relevant_findings.abdominal_examination: Tender abdomen but not acute, rectal exam guaiac negative.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Heart rate increased from 88 bpm on admission to 122 bpm at transfer.
